profile.name: Hassan Taj
profile.about: I'm a self-motivated, tech enthusiast with good communication skills, I look forward to learn new technologies and set a mark in the market. I currently have a good understanding of Full Stack Web development with Asp.net MVC/Core 2.x WebAPI and have worked with ERP, CMS, Google Maps api, Block chain and Crypto wallet integration.

experiences.description: At Douxl Technologies, i helped the organization improve their current code applications, implementation of coding standards and design patterns that were neccessary. Here i had a great experience of working on a Finance ERP and a Garage Management System along with my team, the enviroment was friendly and we had flexable timings which enabled me to work flexably.

During my time at Cybersoft, i learned a lot working on different projects, i worked on projects which were ETS transprot, Generalized CMS, Xamarin App for CMS Rendering, working on all these projects helped me get a better understanding of Google Maps APIs, Angular 4-8, WPF app developement, Asp.Net Core Web Apis and Asp.Net MVC apps

At 5A Technologies i was appointed as Associate Software Engineer where i began my career as a Asp.NET MVC Web Developer, here my mentor and lead taught me a lot about .net stuff, how to write quality code. I also was able to work on different projects which Included some Basic Web Apps, i was given an oppertunity to work on some modules of a Finance ERP system.
